visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chart with a spline type, titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May' and the y-axis should have labels styled with a font size of 12px and color #333333. The chart should have two data series named 'Product A' and 'Product B' with the following data: [10, 15, 13, 17, 20] for 'Product A' and [12, 9, 14, 10, 18] for 'Product B'. Use custom colors #008000 for 'Product A' and #FF0000 for 'Product B'. The chart should have a white background, a margin of 50px on all sides, and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration sets up a spline chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis categories are months from January to May, and the y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The chart includes two data series: 'Product A' with data [10, 15, 13, 17, 20] and 'Product B' with data [12, 9, 14, 10, 18]. Custom colors are applied to each series: #008000 for 'Product A' and #FF0000 for 'Product B'. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50px on all sides. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
